reviews.review: To start it's a shame that I can't include 2 more games with this one in this review. Basically, this is a piece of art, this is the best of the best, story, gameplay, graphics, everything in this game, and its episodes are fantastic. I'm in love with this game, and to be honest nothing will change that (even if the last chapter, maybe last chapter who knows, doesn't come out) It is still and will be the best in my heart. Half life 2 is the king on storyline and well, having fun aswell in it, and well hitting your feelings when needed, whever it is fear, or sadness, or even anger. I. LOVE. IT. And I hope, I do hope the story continues, I play it from time to time, doing the story again and again, without getting bored of it, I just hope that one day, I can finish this story, an ending in Episode Two that left me with a big scar since I played it the first time. I love you Half life 2 and you too Valve, and Mr. Gabe Newell, Thank you and everyone who worked on this piece of art <3. 10/10 will always stay in my heart <3333333333333
FPS couloir classique mais amusant avec des passages un peu stressant

Esse jogo revolucionou o gênero FPS novamente, traz uma história intrigante, imersiva e super bem construída! É suspreendente ver a quantidade de puzzles dentro de um jogo como este e as formas como podem ser resolvidos. Half Life 2 é aquele jogo que transcende gerações, dita padrões e foca na imersão narrativa. Consegue igualar a qualidade do jogo anterior sem ser repetitivo. 
Simplesmente um dos melhores jogos da história!
This game is a Rite of Passage for anyone on steam.
I allways return to this game, it is soooo good!

I bought HL2 on release day. Having played Half Life, I really wanted to give it's sequal a good run through. 

When I started my first game(all those years ago), I was stunned by the graphix valvE had incorporated into it. Visually, it was stunning!

The gameplay was good. Good ol' Gordon Freeman returns to a world vastly different than he left at the end of Half Life. 

Your goal? To be the right man in the wrong place, as you can make all the diff---erence in the world. 

Even by todays standards, HL2 is a work of art visually speaking. I've played it through several times, and never get bored with it.
Defintly needs a sequel. Poor Gabe wont release it to us as well as L4D3.

Лучшая игра, в которую я когда-либо играл. Да. Я фанат этой игры, особенно первого эпизода второй части. Слегка романтичная история Гордона и Алекс, драма, разлука, встреча, безумие, переживания, боль, радость, секреты, трудности - всё это вселенная игры Half-Life. Очень рекомендую всем поиграть в эту игру и влюбиться в неё так же, как влюбиля в неё я. Игра действительно замечательная и многие сотни тысяч игроков ждут продолжение этой трилогии. Но, пока что, всё тихо и у нас ничего не остается кроме надежды. Надежды на то, что Valve подарит нам новые яркие эмоции и переживания за персонажей!
This is probably one of the best games I have ever played

Around the time this game was made, the industry was focused on open-world games, so graphics progressed slower then they would otherwise have. However, Valve are excellent storytellers and don't need to make a game that is 5% story for lack of ideas. They used every resource at their disposal to make the best graphics imaginable, and don't need huge world to do it. The fact that the story and gameplay is even better, however, says something.

WOW, un vero capolavoro: trama buona , gameplay sempre interessante , vasta varietá di armi, personaggi abbastanza caratterizzati. Insomma davvero un bel gioco ma raga il DOPPIAGGIO No! Il doppiaggio è di una vie di mezzo tra l'africano e il rumeno , cazzo su un gioco bello come half Life 2 proprio il doppiaggio mi dovevate rovinare! Io ve lo consiglio ma ripeto, sono dispiaciuto per il cazzo di doppiaggio. Il mio voto è 8/10

[h1]Премия «Проверено временем»[/h1]

[i]Очередной значок в Steam наконец меня смог заставить написать отзыв к данной Игре.[/i]

Многие уже и без меня похвалили данную Игру (да-да, я пишу данное слово с большой буквы, так как HL2 это заслуживает), но я узнал о ней очень давно (точнее ровно десять лет назад) в компльютерном клубе, когда все играли в CS и Dota (бля, не многое изменилось :D) и она меня очень сильно затянула.

Сильно распинаться не буду, скажу лишь то, что графика мало чем уступает играм, вышедших более десятка лет спустя, да и сюжет весьма интересен и подан хорошо. Саундтрек бесподобен.

The thing that pushes the boundaries of media is rarely noticed. It's something that comes out and says, "yeah we don't need to do it that way"
Half-Life 2 is a video game. But it doesn't feel like one. Sure you have a massive arsenal of weaponry and the story certainly centers around you. But once you enter that world... you're there. There's no distractions the worst being the loading screens but even those are minimal. All the information is revealed organically in the world. You learn who you are. How to fight. And the controls aren't complicated so it's a quick study. Characters react to things you do. And there's no cutscenes. 

The graphics are realistic yet have a specific style that has aided in preventing aging. It's its own world. And it's one that I continue to revisit because being Gordon Freeman is one of the best experiences in games.
